title: Trying to disable camera zoom manually with config but can't make it work, have done it before
body:
Ive tried every possible way of doing it manually in the input/game configs with all sorts of variations of [mousesettings] rollerbuttonspeed=0, with spaces, without spaces, with caps and without, 2 lines, 1 line, but nothing works.

I have successfully done it previously but it just doesnt seem to work anymore

replies.body: Manually adjusting config settings like this is not something I can recommend, as it could make your gameplay accessibility worsen.  Our tech team might be able provide better context by [sending a player support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
